member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1
member.summary: Represents a paged response returned from the API.
member.typeparam: Type of items contained in the result set.
member.remarks: This object contains pagination metadata along with the requested data page.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1.Items
member.summary: Collection of items for the current page.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1.TotalCount
member.summary: Total number of items available for the given query.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1.Page
member.summary: Current page number (starts from 1).

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1.PageSize
member.summary: Number of items returned per page.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Common.PagedResultDto`1.TotalPages
member.summary: Total number of pages calculated based on and .

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuestionListItemDto
member.summary: Represents a lightweight view of a question.
member.remarks: This DTO is typically used in list or search results where full question details are not required.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuestionListItemDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuestionListItemDto.Text
member.summary: Text content of the question.
member.remarks: Does not include the correct answer.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuestionListItemDto.CreatedAtUtc
member.summary: UTC date and time when the question was created.
member.remarks: Stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizDetailsDto
member.summary: Represents detailed information about a quiz.
member.remarks: This DTO is returned when retrieving a single quiz, including all associated questions.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizDetailsDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizDetailsDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the quiz.
member.remarks: The name is defined by the user during quiz creation or update.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizDetailsDto.Questions
member.summary: Collection of questions that belong to the quiz.
member.remarks: Questions are typically returned in the defined display order.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizListItemDto
member.summary: Represents a lightweight view of a quiz used in list responses.
member.remarks: This DTO is typically returned when retrieving a paged list of quizzes. It does not include full question details.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizListItemDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizListItemDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizListItemDto.QuestionCount
member.summary: Total number of questions associated with the quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizListItemDto.CreatedAtUtc
member.summary: UTC date and time when the quiz was created.
member.remarks: Stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizQuestionDto
member.summary: Represents a question that belongs to a quiz.
member.remarks: This DTO contains both the question text and its correct answer. It is typically returned when retrieving detailed quiz information.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizQuestionDto.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier of the question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizQuestionDto.Text
member.summary: Text content of the question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Dtos.QuizQuestionDto.CorrectAnswer
member.summary: Correct answer for the question.
member.remarks: This value is used for quiz validation purposes and is not included in export formats intended for participants.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.EntityNotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a requested entity cannot be found in the system.
member.remarks: This exception is typically used in the application layer when an entity with a specific identifier does not exist in the data store. It is commonly mapped to an HTTP 404 (Not Found) response.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.EntityNotFoundException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Name of the entity type.
Identifier value used to search for the entity.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.EntityNotFoundException.Entity
member.summary: Gets the name of the entity that was not found.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.EntityNotFoundException.Key
member.summary: Gets the identifier value used in the lookup.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.MissingArgumentException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a required argument is missing.
member.remarks: Typically mapped to an HTTP 400 (Bad Request) response.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.MissingArgumentException.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Description of the missing argument error.
Name of the missing parameter.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.ExporterNotFoundException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a requested exporter cannot be found.
member.remarks: This exception is typically raised when the provided exporter key does not match any registered exporter implementation. It is commonly mapped to an HTTP 400 (Bad Request) or 404 (Not Found) response, depending on API design decisions.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.ExporterNotFoundException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The exporter key that was requested.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Exceptions.ExporterNotFoundException.Key
member.summary: Gets the exporter key that could not be resolved.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.CreateQuizRequest
member.summary: Represents the request model used to create a new quiz.
member.remarks: A quiz can consist of: - Existing questions (referenced by their identifiers), - Newly created questions, - Or a combination of both.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.CreateQuizRequest.Name
member.summary: Name of the quiz.
member.remarks: This value is required and should be unique within the system.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.CreateQuizRequest.ExistingQuestionIds
member.summary: Collection of identifiers of existing questions to be reused in the new quiz.
member.remarks: This enables "question recycling", allowing previously created questions to be included in the new quiz.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.CreateQuizRequest.NewQuestions
member.summary: Collection of new questions to be created and added to the quiz.
member.remarks: Each question must include question text and correct answer.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.NewQuestionRequest
member.summary: Represents a request model for creating a new question.
member.remarks: This model is used when adding new questions while creating or updating a quiz. Both the question text and the correct answer are required.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.NewQuestionRequest.Text
member.summary: Text content of the question.
member.remarks: Must not be empty. The text should clearly describe the question.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.NewQuestionRequest.CorrectAnswer
member.summary: Correct answer to the question.
member.remarks: This value is stored internally and is not included in participant exports.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuestionPagedRequest
member.summary: Represents query parameters used for searching and paginating questions.
member.remarks: This request model supports text-based search and standard pagination. It is typically used when selecting existing questions for quiz creation.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuestionPagedRequest.Search
member.summary: Text used to search questions by their content.
member.remarks: Performs a case-insensitive search against the question text. If null or empty, all questions are returned.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuestionPagedRequest.Page
member.summary: Page number to retrieve (starts from 1).

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuestionPagedRequest.PageSize
member.summary: Number of items to return per page.
member.remarks: Default value is 50. The API may enforce a maximum limit.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest
member.summary: Represents query parameters used for searching and paginating quizzes.
member.remarks: This request model supports text-based search and standard pagination.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest.Search
member.summary: Text used to search quiz by name.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest.Page
member.summary: Page number (starts from 1).

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest.PageSize
member.summary: Number of items per page (default 50).

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest.SortOrder
member.summary: Defines sorting direction by quiz name. Allowed values: Asc or Desc. Default: Desc.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.UpdateQuizRequest
member.summary: Represents the request model used to update an existing quiz.
member.remarks:
Allows updating the quiz name and redefining the set of questions that belong to the quiz.
The quiz can consist of: - Existing questions (referenced by their identifiers), - Newly created questions, - Or a combination of both.
Questions not included in the request will be removed from the quiz, but will remain stored in the system for future reuse.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.UpdateQuizRequest.Name
member.summary: Updated name of the quiz.
member.remarks: If provided, replaces the existing quiz name.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.UpdateQuizRequest.ExistingQuestionIds
member.summary: Collection of identifiers of existing questions to associate with the quiz.
member.remarks: Enables reusing previously created questions.

member.name: P:QuizMaker.Application.Requests.UpdateQuizRequest.NewQuestions
member.summary: Collection of new questions to be created and added to the quiz.
member.remarks: Each question must include question text and correct answer.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Services.ExporterService
member.summary: Service responsible for providing information about available quiz exporters.
member.remarks: This service retrieves exporter metadata from the underlying exporter catalog. Exporters are dynamically discovered using MEF and exposed to clients so they can select a desired export format.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.ExporterService.#ctor(QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IExporterCatalog)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Catalog used to retrieve dynamically registered exporters.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.ExporterService.GetAll
member.summary: Retrieves all currently available exporters.
member.returns: A list of exporter metadata objects describing supported export formats.
member.remarks: The returned data includes exporter key, display name, file extension, and MIME type. The key must be used when invoking the quiz export endpoint.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuestionService
member.summary: Service responsible for managing question-related operations.
member.remarks: Provides functionality for searching and retrieving questions with pagination support. Acts as an application layer abstraction over the question repository.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuestionService.#ctor(QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Repository used for accessing question data.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuestionService.SearchPagedAsync(QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuestionPagedRequest)
member.summary: Searches questions using optional text filtering and pagination.
member.param: Search and pagination parameters.
member.returns: A paged result containing lightweight question representations.
member.remarks: If no search term is provided, all questions are returned in a paged format. Pagination defaults to page 1 and page size 50 if not specified.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizExportService
member.summary: Service responsible for exporting quizzes to various file formats.
member.remarks: This service retrieves the requested quiz and delegates the export process to a dynamically discovered exporter implementation. Exporters are resolved via the exporter catalog (MEF-based).

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizExportService.#ctor(QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository,QuizMaker.Domain.Export.IExporterCatalog)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Repository used to retrieve quiz data including associated questions.
Catalog responsible for resolving available exporters.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizExportService.ExportAsync(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Exports the specified quiz using the requested exporter.
member.param: Unique identifier of the quiz to export.
Key identifying the exporter to use (e.g., "csv", "pdf", "txt").
member.returns: An containing file content, file name, and MIME type.
member.exception: Thrown when is empty or is not provided.
Thrown when no exporter is registered for the specified key.
Thrown when the quiz with the specified identifier does not exist.
member.remarks: The quiz is retrieved along with its associated questions. The exporter is responsible for generating the file content and metadata.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService
member.summary: Service responsible for managing quiz lifecycle operations.
member.remarks:
Provides functionality for creating, updating, retrieving, deleting, and paginating quizzes.
Handles business rules such as: - Question recycling - Display order management - Soft deletion - Mapping domain entities to DTOs

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.#ctor(QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuizRepository,QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IQuestionRepository,QuizMaker.Domain.Interfaces.IUnitOfWork)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Repository for quiz data access.
Repository for question data access.
Unit of work used to persist changes.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.GetPagedAsync(QuizMaker.Application.Requests.QuizPagedRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves paginated list of quizzes.
member.param: Search, paging and sorting parameters.
member.returns: A paged result containing lightweight quiz representations.
member.remarks: Supports: - Text-based search by quiz name - Pagination - Sorting by creation date

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.GetByIdAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves detailed information about a specific quiz.
member.param: Unique identifier of the quiz.
member.returns: Detailed quiz information including ordered questions. Returns null if the quiz does not exist.
member.remarks: Questions are returned in their defined display order.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.CreateAsync(QuizMaker.Application.Requests.CreateQuizRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new quiz.
member.param: Data required to create the quiz, including: - Quiz name - Existing question identifiers - Newly created questions
member.returns: The unique identifier of the newly created quiz.
member.exception: Thrown when the request model is null.
member.remarks: Supports question recycling by linking existing questions. Newly created questions are persisted before associating them with the quiz. Display order is automatically assigned based on insertion order.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.UpdateAsync(System.Guid,QuizMaker.Application.Requests.UpdateQuizRequest)
member.summary: Updates an existing quiz.
member.param: Identifier of the quiz to update.
Updated quiz data including: - New quiz name - Existing question identifiers - Newly created questions
member.returns: True if the update was successful.
member.exception: Thrown when the request model is null.
Thrown when the quiz does not exist.
member.remarks: Existing quiz-question relationships are cleared and rebuilt. Questions remain stored in the system even if removed from the quiz.

member.name: M:QuizMaker.Application.Services.QuizService.DeleteAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a quiz.
member.param: Identifier of the quiz to delete.
member.exception: Thrown when the quiz does not exist.
member.remarks: Deleting a quiz does not remove associated questions from the system.

member.name: T:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants
member.summary: Defines validation-related constants used across the application.
member.remarks:
Centralizes maximum lengths and paging constraints to ensure consistency between: - Domain validation - Data annotations - Database configuration - Service-layer validation
Prevents magic numbers and promotes maintainability.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.QuizNameMaxLength
member.summary: Maximum allowed length for a quiz name.
member.remarks: Used in request validation and database configuration.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.QuizNameMinLength
member.summary: Minimum allowed length for a quiz name.
member.remarks: Used in request validation and database configuration.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.QuizQuestionsMaxLength
member.summary: Maximum allowed length for a quiz questions.
member.remarks: Used in request validation and database configuration.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.QuestionTextMaxLength
member.summary: Maximum allowed length for question text.
member.remarks: Ensures question content does not exceed database limits.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.QuestionTextMinLength
member.summary: Minimum allowed length for question text.
member.remarks: Ensures question content does not exceed database limits.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.CorrectAnswerMaxLength
member.summary: Maximum allowed length for the correct answer of a question.
member.remarks: Applied during validation and persistence.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.DefaultPage
member.summary: Default page number.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.DefaultPageSize
member.summary: Default number of items returned per page when paging parameters are not provided.

member.name: F:QuizMaker.Application.Validation.ValidationConstants.MaxPageSize
member.summary: Maximum allowed number of items per page.
member.remarks: Prevents excessive data retrieval and protects API performance.

member.name: T:ExporterDto
member.summary: Represents metadata describing an available quiz exporter.
member.remarks: This DTO is returned by the API to inform clients which export formats are currently supported by the system.

member.name: P:ExporterDto.Key
member.summary: Unique identifier of the exporter.
member.remarks: This value must be provided as the exporter query parameter when calling the quiz export endpoint. Example: "csv", "pdf", "txt".

member.name: P:ExporterDto.DisplayName
member.summary: Human-readable name of the exporter.
member.remarks: Intended for display purposes in the UI. Example: "CSV", "PDF", "Plain Text".

member.name: P:ExporterDto.FileExtension
member.summary: File extension produced by the exporter.
member.remarks: Does not include the leading dot. Example: "csv", "pdf", "txt".

member.name: P:ExporterDto.MimeType
member.summary: MIME type associated with the exported file.
member.remarks: Used to correctly set the Content-Type header in the response. Example: "text/csv", "application/pdf".
